prompt.tag: Design a minimalist poster for a theater show
prompt.description: Use a black backdrop for drama. Feature a single stage photo lit by natural shadows, highlighting the performer’s emotion. Keep the palette dark with selective bright beams from stage lighting.

library.title: Curated template library, tailored to every need
library.description: Organized categories surface the right design instantly—no need to start from scratch.

pro.title: Production-ready designs out of the box
pro.description: Each template is crafted by professional designers to guarantee visual polish and usability.

layerIntelligence.title: Every layer is intelligent
layerIntelligence.description: Each layer understands its content and responds precisely to targeted edit commands.

aiExecution.title: Edit or redraw on command

callDesigner.title: Work with designers
callDesigner.description: Invite experts for assets, feedback, and approvals to speed up launch.

elite.title: Top designers on call
elite.description: Connect with world-class designers who are on standby around the clock. Late-night sparks or urgent launches receive an immediate creative response.

realtime.title: Real-time collaborative editing
realtime.description: Jump into the canvas together, mirror cursors, and see updates instantly—designers feel right beside you for every idea.

hero.title: Choose your creative journey
hero.description: Start free and upgrade as you grow. Clear, transparent pricing with cancel anytime.

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for dipping your toes into AI design with zero barrier.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Best for power users who need every advanced feature unlocked.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Built for large teams that need centralized control and seamless collaboration.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about CanDe, pricing, and AI design workflows.
faq.contact: Still have questions? Talk to sales.

usageRights.question: Can I use generated posters commercially? Who owns the rights?
usageRights.answer:
Yes. Anything you create with CanDe is yours. You own the full copyright, which means:
No additional license—you can use assets for ads, marketing, print, and more
Exclusive ownership—we never resell or reuse your generated designs
No hidden fees—no royalty or copyright charges
Full freedom—edit, redistribute, or resell your designs anytime

turnaround.question: How long does AI poster generation take?
turnaround.answer: Most drafts are ready within minutes. You can keep iterating and polishing, but the entire flow rarely exceeds 30 minutes.

exportFormats.question: Which export formats are supported?
exportFormats.answer: Export to JSON, PNG, JPG, JPEG, and SVG. High-resolution export unlocks on the Professional plan and above.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Absolutely. Cancel from your account settings whenever you want. No extra fees, and you retain access until the billing cycle ends.

collaboration.question: Does CanDe support team collaboration?
collaboration.answer: Not yet. Team collaboration is on the roadmap—stay tuned for updates.

support.question: How do I contact technical support?
support.answer: Free users can tap into the community. Professional gets priority email support, while Enterprise unlocks 24/7 phone assistance.
